languageSelector.context: Language as a single word used in the langiage selection menu.

chosenLanguage.context: When a language is chosen by a user, this is the word displayed to describe the chosen language.

signIn.context: A button that when clicked allows a user to login or register.

logout.context: A label for a button allowing a user to logout.

administration.context: A label for a button allowing a user to access the Administraion module.

linkHelp.context: This is the text for a link to the Help page.

linkAbout.context: The link text for the About link.

linkPrivacy.context: The link text for the Privacy link.

linkAccessibility.context: The link text for the Accessibility link.

linkContact.context: The link text for the Contact link.

linkApps.context: The link text for the Apps link.

linkResources.context: The link text for the Resources link.

linkFollowUs.context: The link text for the Follow Us link.

linkTrademark.context: The link text for the Trademark link.

textTrademark.message: PEOPLE LOCATOR®，ReUnite® 和 TriagePic® 是美國衛生與公眾服務部(HHS)的注冊商標。
textTrademark.context: Verbiage describing the three registered trademarks we hold on People Locator.

expirationDate.context: Verbiage describing the expiration date of the OMB notice.

plusError1.message: 錯誤：用戶名或密碼有錯
plusError1.context: Error message presented when a user provides the incorrect username and/or password.

plusError2.message: 錯誤：因為登錄多次失敗，賬戶暫時關閉，請稍后再試
plusError2.context: Error message presented when a user fails to login repeatedly.

plusError6.message: 錯誤：所輸入的郵箱地址已被佔用
plusError6.context: Error message presented when user tries to use an email address already in use.

plusError7.message: 錯誤：所輸入的用戶名已被佔用
plusError7.context: Error message presented when a user attempts to register with a username that is already in use by another user.

plusError8.message: 錯誤：所輸入的郵件地址無效
plusError8.context: Error message presented when a user provides an invalid email address.

plusError9.message: 錯誤：密碼的長度必須是8至16個字符，其中至少含有一個大寫字母，一個小寫字母，一個數字
plusError9.context: Error message presented when user enters an invalid password.

plusError11.message: 錯誤：所提供的郵件地址與現有任何用戶無關
plusError11.context: Error message presented when user attempts to reset password with an unregistered email address.

plusError14.message: 錯誤：驗証結果有錯誤，請重新輸入
plusError14.context: Error message presented when the captcha system encounters invalid data.

plusError15.message: 錯誤：驗証碼失效，請刷新頁面再試
plusError15.context: Error message presented when the reCaptcha session has expired and the user must reload the page to continue.

plusError16.context: Error message presented when entered password do not match one another.

plusError20.message: 錯誤：密碼的長度必須是8至16個字符
plusError20.context: Error message presented when entered password is of incorrect length, must be 8-16 characters long.

plusError21.message: 錯誤：密碼至少需要一個大寫字母(A-Z)
plusError21.context: Error message presented when entered password does not contain at least one uppercase letter.

plusError22.message: 錯誤：密碼至少需要一個小寫字母(a-z)
plusError22.context: Error message presented when entered password does not contain at least one lowercase letter.

plusError23.message: 錯誤：密碼至少需要一個數字(0-9)
plusError23.context: Error message presented when entered password does not contain at least one digit.

plusError100.message: 網絡錯誤：請檢查您的線路再試
plusError100.context: Error message presented when there is a network / internet issue.

plusError600.message: 錯誤：您所尋找的數據不存在，或因為您沒有相應的權限查詢
plusError600.context: Error message presented when user attempts to follow a record they have no permission to access.

plusError601.message: 錯誤：無法連接，因為您已進入此數據的連接裡
plusError601.context: Error message presented when attempting to follow a record the user is already following.

plusError602.message: 錯誤：無法退出，您已經退出了此數據的連接

plusError9999.context: Error message presented when an unknown error has occurred.

errorGettingSubscription.message: 錯誤：訂閱推送通知時出錯， 請刷新頁面再試。
errorGettingSubscription.context: This error will be displayed when an error is encountered while loading the user subscription information.

errorUnsubscribing.message: 錯誤：退訂推送通知時發生錯誤。
errorUnsubscribing.context: This error will be displayed when an error is encountered while the user is attempting to unsubscribe from notifications.

notifyLogin.context: This notification will appear after the user successfully logs in.

notifyRegister.context: This notification will appear after the user newly registers and is automatically logged in.

notifyRegistering.context: This notification will appear briefly as the system registers and creates a new account for the user.

notifyPasswordChanged.context: This notification will appear after the user successfully changes their password.

notifyRecordUnfollowed.context: This notification will appear after the user unfollows a particular record.

notifyUnsubscribed.message: 您已經退出訂閱，從此不會再收到我們的推送通知。
notifyUnsubscribed.context: This notification will appear after the user unsubscribed from recieving notifications.

notifySubscribed.message: 訂閱成功，從現在開始，您會收到我們的推送通知。 You are now subscribed to recieve notifications.
notifySubscribed.context: This notification will appear after the user subscribes to recieving notifications.

notifyResetPassword.message: 我們已經給您送出一封電子郵件，介紹如何重置密碼。
notifyResetPassword.context: This notification appears when a user has successfully sent a request to reset their password.

pad1login.context: This is the name of the first tab of the user dialog allowing a user to login.

pad1register.context: This is the name of the second tab of the user dialog allowing a user to register.

pad1forgotText.message: 請輸入您的電子郵箱地址， 我們將給您發送郵件，介紹如何重新設置密碼。
pad1forgotText.context: This text informs the user of what they must do in order to reset their password ~ they must enter their email address.

pad1forgotSend.context: This is the text label on the forgot my password dialog to submit the form.

pad1loginForgot.context: This is the text label for the forgot my password button on the login dialog.

pad1loginUsernamePlaceholder.context: This is the placeholder text for the username input.

pad1loginPasswordPlaceholder.context: This is the placeholder text for the password input.

pad1registerEmailPlaceholder.context: This is the placeholder text for the email input.

pad1registerText.message: 輸入的密碼中至少要有一個數字， 一個小寫字母， 一個大寫字母，密碼的長度為8至16個字符。
pad1registerText.context: This is the text displayed while the user is in the process of registering informing them of our minimum password requirements.

pad2notice.context: This is the first word of the OMB notice.

pad2submission.message: 上傳信息都是個人自願行為，所上傳的信息全部都將向公眾全部公開。
pad2submission.context: These are the first two sentences of the OMB notice.

pad2text.message: 公眾從輸入信息開始到完成提交報告，大約需要三分鐘。這三分鐘裡，包括了查看指令，收集和輸入數據所需的時間。除非標有美國行政管理和預算局(OMB)的有效編號，任何部門不得組織，或資助搜集此類信息，任何個人也無須而為。如果您有任何有關提交報告所需時間，或者任何有關搜集信息的建議，請送:
pad2text.context: This is the main paragraph of the OMB notice.

pad2sub.message: 我已經詳細閱讀了以上提示，並且表示完全同意。
pad2sub.context: This is the label for the OMB notice agreement button.

pad3following.context: This is the name of the first tab of user preferences that shows which records a user is following.

pad3settings.context: This is the name of the second tab of user preferences that shows user settings.

pad3loading.context: This word is displayed when the following records tab is loading results from the server.

pad3emptyFollow.context: This verbiage is displayed when the following records panel is displayed and the user is not following any records.

pad3unFollow.context: This is the text label applied to the button that allows a user to unfollow updates to a record.

pad3subStatusUnsubscribed.context: This text label tells of the status of the user not being subscribed to recieve notifications.

pad3subStatusSubscribed.context: This text label tells the status of the user being subscribed to recieve notifications.

pad3subscribeTo.context: This is the title text to the section that allows a user to opt-in to recieve push notifications.

pad3Time.message: 從現在起，每當有新的事件發生，我們將給您發送推送通知。
pad3Time.context: This verbiage describes the extent to which we use the push notification subscription a user provides to send out information.

pad3changePasswordButton.context: This verbiage describes the extent to which we use the push notification subscription a user provides to send out information.

pad3passwordRequirements.message: 輸入的密碼至少要有一個數字， 一個小寫之母，一個大寫字母，密碼的長度為8至16個字符。
pad3passwordRequirements.context: This verbiage describes the extent to which we use the push notification subscription a user provides to send out information.

pad3oldPasswordPlaceholder.context: This is the placeholder text for the old password input.

pad3newPassword1Placeholder.context: This is the placeholder text for the new password input.

pad3newPassword2Placeholder.context: This is the placeholder text for the new password again input.

pushNotificationsUnsupported.message: 您的瀏覽器不支持推送通知。
pushNotificationsUnsupported.context: This text tells the user that their current web browser does not support the push notification feature.

pushNotificationsDisallowed.message: 本網頁無法顯示推送通知，如要顯示，您需要在設置中改變權限。
pushNotificationsDisallowed.context: This text tells the user that they have prohibited the site from using push notifications and that they must re-enable this feature to subscribe.

helpFindTitle.context: This is the title of the help page section on how to find/search.

helpReportText.message: -- PLACEHOLDER TEXT DO NOT TRANSLATE -- PLACEHOLDER TEXT DO NOT TRANSLATE -- PLACEHOLDER TEXT DO NOT TRANSLATE -- PLACEHOLDER TEXT DO NOT TRANSLATE -- PLACEHOLDER TEXT DO NOT TRANSLATE -- PLACEHOLDER TEXT DO NOT TRANSLATE -- PLACEHOLDER TEXT DO NOT TRANSLATE -- PLACEHOLDER TEXT DO NOT TRANSLATE -- PLACEHOLDER TEXT DO NOT TRANSLATE -- PLACEHOLDER TEXT DO NOT TRANSLATE -- PLACEHOLDER TEXT DO NOT TRANSLATE -- PLACEHOLDER TEXT DO NOT TRANSLATE
helpReportText.context: This is the help page article body describing in detail how to report a person or pet.

pageAboutTextAbout.message: 本網站是由位於美國馬裡蘭州貝塞斯達市的美國國家醫學圖書館(NLM)提供，NLM隸屬美國衛生及公共服務部(HHS)美國國立衛生研究院(NIH)，其使命在於提高通信技術的發展和協調，促進醫療服務。本網站目的在於研究應對災害的工具及功能。網站由LPF(Lost and Founder) 項目團隊開發，其中一部分是針對Bethesda醫院的BHEPP(Bethesda Hospitals' Emergency Preparedness Partnership)而開發的。自2008年起，LPF和NLM的IT部門開始獲得聯邦政府的資助。LPF目前是NIH的院內研究項目（Intramural Research Program），由NLM的LHNCBC(Lister Hill National Center for Biomedical Communications）資助。軟件開發由LHNCBC下屬的CEB(Communication Engineering Branch)領導，網站部分內容來自於LHNCBC 的CSB(Computer Science Branch)和DIMRC(Disaster Information Management Research Center)，該部門也屬NLM的SIS(Specialized Information Services)管轄。
pageAboutTextAbout.context: This is the first paragraph of verbiage on the About page describing the purpose of the PEOPLE LOCATOR.

pageAboutTextBrowser.message: 您必須在瀏覽器中啟用cookie和JavaScript。同時，您必須安裝有下列一至兩個最新版本的瀏覽器：Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Opera, Edge, or Internet Explorer。
pageAboutTextBrowser.context: This is the text on the About page describing web browsers support.

pageAboutHeaderBrowser.context: On the About page, section header title Browser Support.

pageAboutHeaderFAQ.context: On the About page, this is the link to datasheets and the FAQ.

pageAboutFAQ.context: Frequently Asked Questions link title on About page.

pagePrivacyText1.message: 除非另有說明，基於社區交流的數據由本網站向公眾發布，並允許任何訪問者進行搜索。 綜上所述，我們的此數據來自各種途徑，由NLM匯集而成:
pagePrivacyText1.context: This is the first text paragraph on the Privacy page describing how user data is handled.

pagePrivacyText2a.context: Beginning of the second paragraph on the Privacy page.

pagePrivacyText2b.message: 本網站沒有主持，其他參與機構請勿預審或核實本網站上提出的任何數據的准確性。請注意，收到的數據是由用戶直接提交
pagePrivacyText2b.context: Large portion of the second paragraph of the Privacy page.

pagePrivacyText2c.message: 請轉發給其他機關，機構和組織協助努力尋找失蹤的人，包括但不局限於
pagePrivacyText2c.context: End portion of the second paragraph of the Privacy page.

pagePrivacyText3a.context: Beginning of the third paragraph on the Privacy page.

pagePrivacyText3b.message: 我們將保留報告提交者的郵件地址和所用電子設備的系列編號，但這些信息是保密的，不會向公從泄露。
pagePrivacyText3b.context: End of the third paragraph on the Privacy page.

pagePrivacyText4.context: Text for the link to NLM's privacy policy page.

pagePrivacyText5.context: Text for the link to the Freedom of Information Act site.

forMore.context: The title for a subsection on the Privacy page with links to more topics.

backButton.context: The text label for all buttons allowing the user to navigate back.

pagePrivacyBullet1.context: The second half ot the first bullet point on the Privacy page.

pagePrivacyBullet2.context: The word application as it applies to the ReUnite app.

pagePrivacyBullet3.context: The fourth bullet point on the Privacy page.

pageResourcesTitle1.context: The first section title on the Resources page.

pageResourcesTitle2.context: The second section title on the Resources page.

pageResourcesTitle3.context: The third section title on the Resources page.

pageResourcesTitle4.context: The fourth section title on the Resources page.

pageResourcesFamily1.message: 紅十字會安全和健在搜索網
pageResourcesFamily1.context: First bullet link in the Family and Friends section of the Resource page.

pageResourcesFamily2.message: 美國聯邦緊急事務管理署國家緊急家庭登記和定位系統
pageResourcesFamily2.context: Second bullet link in the Family and Friends section of the Resource page.

pageResourcesFamily3.context: Third bullet link in the Family and Friends section of the Resource page.

pageResourcesFamily4.message: 紅十字會重建家庭聯系國際委員會
pageResourcesFamily4.context: fourth buller link in the Family and Friends section of the Resource page.

pageResourcesFromDIMRC.message: 從NLM的災害信息管理研究中心
pageResourcesFromDIMRC.context: Text label for several links to DIMRC on the Resource page.

pageResourcesDisaster2.context: Second bullet link on the Disaster section of the Resource page.

pageResourcesDisaster3.message: 紅十字會提供庇護所和食物
pageResourcesDisaster3.context: Third buller link on the Disaster section of the Resource page.

pageResourcesFromMedlinePlus.context: Text label for several links to Medline Plus on the Resource page.

followUs.context: Used to prompt user to follow us on a social network of their choice.

and.context: The word and used between two nouns.

trademarkText.message: 是美國衛生與公眾服務部(HHS)的注冊商標。
trademarkText.context: The second half of the trademark sentence.

tabDisasterEvents.context: The title of the 1st tab allowing the selection of particular Disaster Events.

tabFind.context: The title of the 2nd tab allowing someone to Find a person or pet.

tabReport.context: The title of the 3rd tab allowing someone to Report a new person or pet.

tagline.message: Find and report missing family, friends, and pets during disasters.
tagline.context: The tagline is the summary of what the application is for.

eventRetired.message: The event you requested is no longer active.
eventRetired.context: We inform the user this message when they attempt to come to us via exact event url when the event is no longer open.

seoTitle1.context: Part 1 of HTML title and description tags for the home page (e.g. Find or report persons from Ecuador Earthquake).

seoTitle2.context: Part 2 of HTML title and description tags for the home page if no active event (e.g. Find or report persons from a disaster).

seoTitle3.context: HTML title tags for the report page (e.g. Report persons from Ecuador Earthquake).

seoTitle4.context: HTML title and description tags for the search page (e.g. Find missing persons from Ecuador Earthquake).

seoTitle5.message: Help finding and reporting missing persons
seoTitle5.context: HTML title tag for the help page.

seoTitle6.message: About finding and reporting missing persons
seoTitle6.context: HTML title tag for the about page.

seoTitle7.message: Privacy considerations for finding and reporting missing persons
seoTitle7.context: HTML title tag for the privacy page.

seoTitle8.message: Resources for finding and reporting missing persons
seoTitle8.context: HTML title tag for the resources page.

seoTitle9.context: Part 1 of HTML title tag for the full record page (e.g. Record for John Doe).

seoTitle10.context: Part 2 of HTML title tag for the full record page (e.g. from Ecuador Earthquake).

seoDescription1.message: Report missing or found persons from the
seoDescription1.context: HTML description tag for the report page (e.g. Report missing or found persons from the Ecuador Earthquake).

seoDescription2.message: Help instructions for finding and reporting missing persons
seoDescription2.context: HTML description tag for the help page.

seoDescription3.message: About using People Locator to find and report missing persons
seoDescription3.context: HTML description tag for the about page.

seoDescription4.message: Privacy considerations for using People Locator to find and report missing persons
seoDescription4.context: HTML description tag for the privacy page.

seoDescription5.message: Other resources for finding and reporting missing persons
seoDescription5.context: HTML description tag for the resources page.

seoDescription6.context: Part 1 of HTML description tag for the full record page (e.g. View and update record for John Doe).

seoDescription7.context: Part 2 of HTML description tag for the full record page (e.g. from the Ecuador Earthquake).

seoAlt1.context: Part 1 of HTML alt tag for a personal photo (e.g. Photo of John Doe)

seoAlt2.context: Part 2 of HTML alt tag for a personal photo (e.g. missing person)

seoAlt3.context: Part 3 of HTML alt tag for a personal photo (e.g. reported in Ecuador Earthquake)

eventListFindReportButton.message: Find / Report a Person or Animal
eventListFindReportButton.context: This is the button text on the home page to Find or Report a person or animal.

searchPlaceholder.context: The search box starts off with this text to inform the user what the element is used for.

records.context: When a search is performed this word is prefixed with the number of results, ie. 17 records

moreDetails.context: When search results are displayed, a user can click on the more details link to open the record displaying all record data.

comments.context: Comments that others may add to a person or animal record.

addComment.context: The label for a button allowing a user to add a comment to a record.

addCommentLabel.message: Add any additional information about this record you may have
addCommentLabel.context: This is the label below the add comment button explaining to a user what it does.

followButton.context: A button allows a user to follow record updates.

followButtonLabel.message: Recieve all updates to this person via email
followButtonLabel.context: This is the label below the follow button explaining to a user what it does.

name.context: This label is displayed under the person or animal name.

status.context: This label is displayed below the person or animal missing / found status.

lastUpdated.context: This label is displayed under the date / time of when a record was last updated.

gender.context: This is a label below the displayed gender of a person or animal.

lastKnownLocation.context: This is a label displayed below a text box showing a person or animal last known location.

lastKnownInformation.context: This is a label displayed below a text box showing a person or animal last known information in text form.

otherInformation.context: This is a label displayed below a text box showing other information about a person or animal.

newReport.context: This is the window title when a new person or animal is being reported.

reportChoicePA.message: Would you like to report a Person or an Animal?
reportChoicePA.context: This is the text option displayed for a user to choose and fill out either a person or animal report.

person.context: This is the text label on a button a user presses to choose a person report.

animal.context: This is the text label on a button a user presses to choose an animal report.

reportChoiceStatus.message: Please indicate the status of the person you are reporting.
reportChoiceStatus.context: This is the text option displayed for a user to choose the status of the person they are reporting.

explainMissing.message: person is believed to be missing
explainMissing.context: The label next to the status selection button for missing.

explainFound.message: person has been found health unknown
explainFound.context: The label next to the status selection button for found.

explainAlive.message: person has been found and is well
explainAlive.context: The label next to the status selection button for alive & well.

explainInjured.message: person has been found and is injured
explainInjured.context: The label next to the status selection button for injured.

explainDeceased.message: person has been found and is deceased
explainDeceased.context: The label next to the status selection button for deceased.

explainUnknown.message: information is sought about the person
explainUnknown.context: The label next to the status selection button for unknown.
